name: get_temperature
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: returns an unevaluated future expression for the temperature of a specific location.

location.description: The location where temperature is queried.

future_id.description: ID of a deferred future expression for the temperature value of the location.

name: eval_future
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: evaluate a previously returned future expression and return its numeric result.

future_id.description: ID of a deferred future expression that will be evaluated.

result.description: the numeric result evluated from the future expression.

name: subtract
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: Subtract one number from another.
